channel.title: gutenbergtimes tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from gutenbergtimes.

item.description: WordCamp Asia @WordCampAsia extended the deadline for speaker submission until 9/30 https://t.co/c4JvLsVodT
item.source:markdown: WordCamp Asia @WordCampAsia extended the deadline for speaker submission until 9/30 https://t.co/c4JvLsVodT

item.description:
WordCamp US, What’s new in WordPress 6.1, Style Variations and The Future of Themes – Weekend Edition 228 https://t.co/EQjGrF83Ty curated by Birgit Pauli-Haack @bph and many contributors: @ArturGrabo @UglyRobotDev @critterverse @pollyplummer @brandedwithj @carlodaniele 1/2

More contributors @richard_tabor @marktimemedia @jon_bossenger @nickmdiego @ryanwelcher @circlecube @nerrad @andersnoren @AnarielDesign Big Thanks for awesome content.
item.source:markdown:

item.description: Gutenberg Changelog #72 - Birgit Pauli-Haack @bph and Nick Diego @nickmdiego discuss highlights from Gutenberg 13.9, 14.01, WordPress 6.02, Themes and Design Tools. https://t.co/AnnCbLNITW
